text: María Paula Bernal (born 13 October 1971) is a Colombian equestrian. She competed in the individual dressage event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Colombia Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1987 Pan American Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: María Paula Bernal
